Description:
Detects when an attacker or tool disables the  Windows Defender service (WinDefend) via the registry

Author: Ján Trenčanský, frack113, AlertIQ, Nasreddine Bencherchali
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Windows Defender Service Disabled - Registry
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where target_object like '%\services\windefend\start' and details = 'dword (0x00000004)'
